hanzi-su-wiki:
匿

Значения

Прятать, скрывать

Мнемоника

Лакомство растительного происхождения, трава 艹, которую берут правой рукой 右 и едят, укрывшись 匸, тайком.

nì
to hide
прятаться
rtega_mnemonic:
匿匿RShide go into hiding, shelter
  • RS. hide collected herbs 若 in a box 匸
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 露
Pictophonetic: 若 indicates the sound; 匸 (box) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
藏匿 [ cáng nì ]: to cover up; to conceal; to go into hiding
隐匿 [ yǐn nì ]: to cover up; to hide; to conceal
销声匿迹 [ xiāo shēng nì jì ]: to vanish without trace (idiom); to lie low
匿名 [ nì míng ]: anonymous
匿迹 [ nì jì ]: to go into hiding
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿷ Surround from left
    • 匸 [ xì ] box
    • 若 [ ruò ] if, supposing, assuming; similar
heisig_chinese_memo: Young kids likes to hide in cardboard boxes to keep out of sight during a game.
heisig_constituent: hide, box, young, flowers, right, by one’s side, mouth
koohiiStory1: Young kids likes to hide in cardboard boxes. (Primitive: CARDBOARD BOX, especially kids playing with them.).
koohiiStory2: Note that stroke order with box primitive is as follows: first horizontal line, then enclosed element, and then a hook (it´s incorrect in 4th edition).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This cage is full of flowers on the right side to hide the fact that you're in here too.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You don't really want to be in this cage, but there were some things you didn't want to do today, so you hid. Luckily these flowers block the right side of the cage and hide you completely.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you hide the ghost of Tokugawa (とく) Ieyasu appears before you, inside the cage! His arms are crossed and he's shaking his head at you. "Do you think I managed to become the first shougun of Japan by hiding?"
WaniKani_Reading_Info: "N-no?" you respond. "Wrong! I hid all the time. There's nothing wrong with hiding, you're doing a great job." he says, and disappears.
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 匚 (коробка на боку), 口 (рот), 艾 (мокса)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the young (person) (若) in the side open box (匚) is hiding
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Young kids likes to hide in cardboard boxes to keep out of sight during a game.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jinwen starts with " 𠃊 ", " If " sound. Bronze inscriptions may not start from " 𠃊 " but from "匚". " 𠃊 " and "匚" are like hiding places. The original meaning is to hide. Xu Shen believes that the original meaning of " hidden " is escape, and both escape and hiding make people know where they are and cannot be discovered (Wang Fengyang). "Shuowen": "Hidden, death. From the womb, if the sound. Read like a sheep's 箠."

The remnant of oracle bone inscriptions, meaning unknown, see "Tunnan" 3566.

Jin Wentong is falsely called "慝", which means evil, and the Great Ding Ding: "In the kingdom of the king of Wu, the king of Wen, Zha (made), he will be (慝), and there are (four directions)." It means that the king of Zhou Wu inherited the King of Wen and established the country. , To eliminate evil ministers (see Shirakawa Jing, Tang Funian).

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the original meaning to indicate hiding. "Bao Yi" Jian 17: "Zi said: "The words follow the deeds, and the deeds must not be hidden." It means that Confucius said: "What you say will be done according to what you say, and your deeds must not be hidden." (Refer to Ji Xusheng). "Shangbo Bamboo Book Six. Jianzhou Jiaben of the Emperor of Heaven, Jane 10: "Only (in) the Tao does not hide in words", which means not to hide on the road. Also known as "慝", "Shangbo Zhushu VI. "Jing Gong Malaria" Jane 6: "The current monarch is greedy (faint) and harsh (慝)", which means that the current monarch is corrupt, faint, harsh, and evil.
humanum_short_description_en: The Jiajin inscription starts with " 𠃊 ", " If " sound, " 𠃊 " is like hiding place, the original meaning is hiding.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「𠃊」，「若」聲。金文或不從「𠃊」而從「匚」，「𠃊」、「匚」皆象藏身的處所，本義是躲藏。許慎認為「匿」的本義是逃亡，逃亡在外和藏匿起來都是使人不知所在，發現不了（王鳳陽）。《說文》：「匿，亡也。从匸，若聲。讀如羊騶箠。」

　　甲骨文辭殘，意義不詳，參《屯南》3566。

　　金文通假為「慝」，表示邪惡，大盂鼎：「在武王嗣文王乍（作）邦，闢厥匿（慝），匍有亖（四方）。」意謂周武王繼承文王，建立國家，闢除邪惡之臣（參白川靜、唐復年）。

　　戰國竹簡用作本義，表示隱藏，《上博竹書一．緇衣》簡17：「子曰：『言從行之，則行不可匿。」意謂孔子說：「說的話都會照著去做，行為就不可掩藏。」（參季旭昇）。《上博竹書六．天子建州甲本》簡10：「才（在）道不語匿」，意謂在路上不說躲藏。又通假為「慝」，《上博竹書六．競公瘧》簡6：「今君之貪惛（昏）苛匿（慝）」，意謂而今君主貪腐、昏庸、苛刻、邪惡。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「𠃊」，「若」聲，「𠃊」象躲藏之處，本義是躲藏。

甲金文從「 𠃊 」，「 若 」聲。金文或不從「 𠃊 」而從「 匚 」，「 𠃊 」、「 匚 」皆象藏身的處所，本義是躲藏。許慎認為「 匿 」的本義是逃亡，逃亡在外和藏匿起來都是使人不知所在，發現不了（王鳳陽）。《說文》：「匿，亡也。从匸，若聲。讀如羊騶箠。」 甲骨文辭殘，意義不詳，參《屯南》3566。 金文通假為「 慝 」，表示邪惡，大盂鼎：「在武王嗣文王乍（作）邦，闢厥匿（慝），匍有亖（四方）。」意謂周武王繼承文王，建立國家，闢除邪惡之臣（參白川靜、唐復年）。 戰國竹簡用作本義，表示隱藏，《上博竹書一．緇衣》簡17：「子曰：『言從行之，則行不可匿。」意謂孔子說：「說的話都會照著去做，行為就不可掩藏。」（參季旭昇）。《上博竹書六．天子建州甲本》簡10：「才（在）道不語匿」，意謂在路上不說躲藏。又通假為「 慝 」，《上博竹書六．競公瘧》簡6：「今君之貪惛（昏）苛匿（慝）」，意謂而今君主貪腐、昏庸、苛刻、邪惡。
Jia Jinwen starts with " 𠃊", " If" sound. Bronze inscriptions may not start from " 𠃊" but from " 匚". " 𠃊" and " 匚" are like hiding places. The original meaning is to hide. Xu Shen believes that the original meaning of " hidden" is escape, and both escape and hiding make people know where they are and cannot be discovered (Wang Fengyang). "Shuowen": "Hidden, death. From the womb, if the sound. Read like a sheep's 箠." The remnant of oracle bone inscriptions, meaning unknown, see "Tunnan" 3566. Jin Wentong is falsely called " 慝", which means evil, and the Great Ding Ding: "In the kingdom of the king of Wu, the king of Wen, Zha (made), he will be (慝), and there are (four directions)." It means that the king of Zhou Wu inherited the King of Wen and established the country. , To eliminate evil ministers (see Shirakawa Jing, Tang Funian). The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the original meaning to indicate hiding. "Bao Yi" Jian 17: "Zi said: "The words follow the deeds, and the deeds must not be hidden." It means that Confucius said: "What you say will be done according to what you say, and your deeds must not be hidden." (Refer to Ji Xusheng). "Shangbo Bamboo Book Six. Jianzhou Jiaben of the Emperor of Heaven, Jane 10: "Only (in) the Tao does not hide in words", which means not to hide on the road. Also known as " 慝", "Shangbo Zhushu VI. "Jing Gong Malaria" Jane 6: "The current monarch is greedy (faint) and harsh (慝)", which means that the current monarch is corrupt, faint, harsh, and evil.

匿字的基本解释

匿
nì
隐藏，躲藏：隐匿。藏匿。匿名。销声匿迹。
藏躲

匿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nì］
［《廣韻》女力切，入職，泥。］
(1)隐藏；隐瞒。
(2)逃亡。
(3)虚假。
[②]［tè］
［《集韻》惕得切，入德，透。］
“慝1”的古字。
(1)邪恶。
(2)差错，差误。

匿字的英文翻译

◎ 匿
conceal, hide

匿字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【匸字部】　匿； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页155第12
【唐韻】【正韻】女力切【集韻】【韻會】昵力切，?音㥾。【說文】亡也。从匸，若聲。【爾雅·釋詁】匿，微也。【註】微謂逃藏也。【廣韻】藏也，亡也，隱也。【史記·留侯世家】良更名姓，亡匿下邳。【曹參傳】見人有細過，專務揜匿覆蓋之。【灌夫傳】廼匿其家。【註】師古曰：匿，避也。又【玉篇】隂姦也。又【前漢·蘇武傳】賜武服匿。【註】孟康曰：服匿如甖，小口大腹方底，用受酒酪。又【集韻】惕得切，音忒。朔而見月東方，曰側匿。

匿字的源字形

匿字的起名意思

暂无。

[Subset 2] [Department of 匸字] 　 hide; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 155-12
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Female force cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Nick force cut,? Yin 㥾. [Said the text] also died. Cong 匸, Ruosheng. 【Erya·Shigu】Hidden, Weiye. [Note] Wei Wei said to escape from hiding. [Guang Yun] Zang Ye, Death Ye, Hidden Ye. 【Historical Records·Liuhou Family】Liang changed his first name and disappeared under Pi. [Cao Shen Biography] Seeing people have been in detail, specializing in hiding and covering them. [Guan Fu Biography] Nai his family. [Note] Shi Gu said: hide, avoid. Also 【Jade articles】Yin and treacherous. Also 【Previous Han·Su Wu Chuan】given Wu Fu Ni. [Note] Mengkang said: The clothes are like a poppy, with a small mouth and a big belly and a square bottom, with wine and cheese. Also 【Jiyun】Be vigilant and sound. When the new moon sees the east of the moon, it says sideways.

hide
Name meaning
Nothing.
匿
匿
金文
(nì)
不知出于什么目的,一个人把自己藏
在了柜子里。
小篆
匿
“匿”是个会意字,本义是将东西藏起来。金文的“匿”,中间是个“人”
形,外部是个柜子的形状,合起来就像是一个人藏匿在柜子当中。小篆的
“匿”,中间变成了“若”字(“若”的金文字形,就像一个人用双手去抓挠自
己的头发),这里表示人在柜子中藏着,双手还抱着自己的头。现在,“匿”字
的常用义为“隐藏”,如“隐匿、藏匿、销声匿迹”。
隶书
匿
楷体
Спрятать
Спрятать
(нм)
По неизвестной причине мужчина спрятался в шкафу.
Спрятать
«Спрятал» - знающее слово, и его изначальное значение - скрывать вещи.
В «скрытой» надписи посередине изображена фигура «человека», а снаружи - форма шкафа, вместе это выглядит так, как будто в шкафу прячется человек.
«Скрытый» Сяочжуаня превратился в слово «若» посередине (золотой символ «若» похож на человека, почесывающего волосы руками), что означает, что человек прячется в шкафу, все еще держась за руки. сам глава.
В настоящее время обычное значение слова «скрытый» - «скрытый», например «скрытый, скрытый, исчезнувший».
Спрятать
Курсив
nì
I гл.
1) скрываться, укрываться; сбежать; залечь; затаиться, притаиться; тайно, скрытно
匿谋 замышлять втайне (заговор)
2) прятать, укрывать; таить (чувство); скрывать, утаивать
匿罪 укрывать преступление (вину)
匿财 скрывать состояние (богатство)
II сущ.
* тайный порок
Radicals: 匚, 艹, 右  (cage, flowers, right)
Meaning Mnemonic
This cage is full of flowers on the right side to hide the fact that you're in here too.
You don't really want to be in this cage, but there were some things you didn't want to do today, so you hid. Luckily these flowers block the right side of the cage and hide you completely.
Reading Mnemonic
As you hide the ghost of Tokugawa (とく) Ieyasu appears before you, inside the cage! His arms are crossed and he's shaking his head at you. "Do you think I managed to become the first shougun of Japan by hiding?"
"N-no?" you respond. "Wrong! I hid all the time. There's nothing wrong with hiding, you're doing a great job." he says, and disappears.
